iterations.yara_rule:
rule Bypass_Sample
{
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rule"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { 48 83 38 FF 74 16 ?? ?? ?? ?? } // cmp rax, FFFFFFFF + je
        $pattern1 = { E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 48 8D 05 ?? ?? ?? ?? } // call ExitProcess + setup
        $pattern2 = { 48 C7 C2 C0 00 00 00 48 C7 44 24 10 02 00 00 00 } // mov edx, C0000000 + mov dword ptr [rsp+20h], 00000002

    condition:
        any of them
}

new_signature_details.name: packer_entropy
new_signature_details.description: The binary likely contains encrypted or compressed data

new_signature_details.name: binary_yara
new_signature_details.description: Binary file triggered multiple YARA rules
